serviceDescription: Generate custom images using Flux AI, allowing for creation of unique visuals based on text prompts with specified dimensions.

generateFluxImage.description: Generate an image using Flux AI

parameters.prompt: Text input required to guide the image generation
parameters.width: The width of the generated image in pixels (256 to 1280)
parameters.height: The height of the generated image in pixels (256 to 1280)

errors.invalidPrompt: The prompt must be a non-empty string.
errors.invalidWidth: The width must be a number between 256 and 1280.
errors.invalidHeight: The height must be a number between 256 and 1280.
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate the image using Flux AI.
